data.rationale:
HTML::Chunks offers a unique templating approach which completely
    separates design from code. Web designers can create well-formed
    HTML prototypes which are also valid Chunks templates which
    programmers can immediately use. In addition, a simple localization
    layer (HTML::ChunksLocal) allows content developers to create
    language-specific text. The localization subclass also supports
    fallback language chaining.
